questions.body: How can the impact of intercompany purchases and sales be offset?
questions.answer: Post journals to an elimination subsidiary

questions.body: Where is the purchase approval limit (amount) defined for supervisors?
questions.answer: On the Employee record

questions.body: Which setting allows returned items to be counted as part of inventory?
questions.answer: Receive Return > Check Restock checkbox

questions.body: Which use case requires the use of a report rather than a search?
questions.answer: Web Query enabled spreadsheet

questions.body: Which two statements are true about the functionality in Report Builder? A.) Users can customize data through Edit Layout Page. B.) User can export Reports as an Excel Web Query. C.) Users can add custom HTML into column headers. D.) Users can add formula fields to columns.
questions.answer: A and B

questions.body: What is the first step an Admin should take after being notified that an employee will be terminated?
questions.answer: Remove System Access for Employee

questions.body: Which structure will allow the tracking of consolidated financial reports by a legal entity?
questions.answer: Subsidiaries

questions.body: What is the impact of enabling the Advanced Shipping feature?
questions.answer: Fulfillment is separated from invoicing

questions.body: What is the simplest way to compare Roles?
questions.answer: Show Role Differences

questions.body: Which two methods can be used to restrict access to a file from the file cabinet?
questions.answer: Restrict Folder to Group and Mark Folder as Private

questions.body: Which three actions can be accomplished with a CSV Import? A.) Delete Customer lead records. B.) Add Transaction records. C.) Add and or Update items. D.) Update existing entity records
questions.answer: B, C, D

questions.body: How can a customer's custom negotiated sales price for items be set up to default on sales transactions?
questions.answer: Assign a price level on the customer record

questions.body: What are three unique features to Financial Report Builder? a.) Sections may be shared between financial reports. b.) Sections may have a highlighted results. c.) Sections are defined by additional sorts, orrided layout sorts. d.) Sections may have specific sorting. e.) Sections may contain subsidiary context.
questions.answer: a, b, d

questions.body: Which two options for defining custom roles will restrict the pool of records that a role can access? a.) Employee Restrictions. b.) Location Restrictions. c.) Restricted Form. d.) IP Address Restrictions
questions.answer: A and B

questions.body: Which feature requires a user to agree to the Mass Messaging Application Terms of Service?
questions.answer: Mail Merge

questions.body: Where can the NeSuite Account Number be found?
questions.answer: SuiteAnswers > Contact Support by Phone

questions.body: Which option must be selected to allow sales reps and managers to adjust the statuses of opportunities when saving forecasts?
questions.answer: Allow Setting Status in Forecast Editor

questions.body: What is the purpose of checking the Internal Only check box on a Case Form?
questions.answer: To email the comments in the Reply window to copied employees

questions.body: Which three Customer Payment Methods are supported in NetSuite?
questions.answer: Electronic Funds Transfer, Credit Card Processing for Sales Orders, and PayPal Express for Web Stores

questions.body: What are three attributes of saved searches? a. Reveals hierarchical groupings. b. Are the basis for custom metrics. c. Can have critical data highlighted. d. Provides a dynamic list of results. e. Good for point-in-time analysis
questions.answer: B, C, D

questions.body: Which three statements are true about creating a Custom Role? a. They can be started from scratch. b. The can be started from a Standard Role. c. They can be edited after they are created. d. They can be deleted while they are assigned.
questions.answer: a, b, c

questions.body: Why might user A not see user B's Calendar?
questions.answer: User B's calendar is not shared as Public

questions.body: What allows more than 10,000 messages to be sent in a single email campaign?
questions.answer: Campaign Domain

questions.body: What is a recommended practice when adding a user?
questions.answer: Assign a custom role

questions.body: A user just closed the record for a customer name Company A by mistake.What is the recommended method to go directly back to the Customer record for Company A?
questions.answer: Use Recent Records

questions.body: Which action can be taken to optimize NetSuites performance in a browser?
questions.answer: Use the smallest portlet level refresh

questions.body: What information is displayed in a pop-up window after double clicking the NetSuite logo?
questions.answer: The PET (Page, Email, Time) page

questions.body: Which two statements are true regarding billable line items on invoices? a. Vendors can enter timesheets. b. Purchase Orders must be Billed before they can be Invoiced to Customers. c. Items must have a Sales Price fill in to appear on the Items to be Billed tab. d. Employees can bill time to customers in different subsidiaries
questions.answer: b and d

questions.body: Which statement is true about inventory transactions?
questions.answer: The inventory worksheet can be used to create opening balances for items

questions.body: How does enabling the Advanced Receiving feature change the Item Receipt function in NetSuite?
questions.answer: It separates the Item Receipt from the Vendor Bill

questions.body: Which statement is true about NetSuite's ecommerce functionality?
questions.answer: Shopping cart automatically saves sales orders in the system

questions.body: Where does an Administrator turn on Custom Records?
questions.answer: Enable Features

questions.body: What are three default CRM List types? a. Contact Role b. Win/Loss Reason c. Contact Type d. Buying Reason e. Quota Category
questions.answer: a, b, d

questions.body: In a Saved Search, what are two ways to get the transaction date to display as month and year?
questions.answer: Use the month function on the Result field or Create a Formula Field using a SQL date formatting function

questions.body: In a OneWorld account, which Two Steps are required to make items taxable?
questions.answer: Create tax schedules for groups of Items and Assign a tax schedule on the item record

questions.body: How does Multi-Location Inventory affect costing?
questions.answer: Costs are calculated at the location level

questions.body: Where can statuses be mapped to actions for the progress of Lead to Prospect to Customer?
questions.answer: Sales Preferences

questions.body: Which Sales Order transaction form can generate a Cash Sale upon billing?
questions.answer: Standard Sales Order

questions.body: Which configuration would allow a user to see only child items?
questions.answer: From company set up enable features, under items and inventory set to only show last sub item

questions.body: Which three Item Types can be defined for Purchase, Resale, or Sale?
questions.answer: Non-inventory item, Service and other charge

questions.body: What are three attributes of a custom report?
questions.answer: Are available for Web Query, Are the basis for custom report snapshots and PRovide a point in time analysis

questions.body: What are three methods to access Help in NetSuite?
questions.answer: Help link in top right of screen, Type Help with any keyword in Global Search, Click the field label next to a field

questions.body: Which three pieces of information are contained in the New Release Portlet?
questions.answer: New Feature Overview, Release Preview Test Plan and Release Notes

questions.body: What is the property of a Case Rule?
questions.answer: It is assigned to a group of Support Reps

questions.body: Which statement is true about native approval and routing options for purchasing (without workflow)?
questions.answer: Purchase Requests are routed to the Purchase Approver base on approval limits set on a transaction record

questions.body: Which two functionalities are controlled by users assigned role? a.) Fax Integration. b.) The password change frequency. c.) Available forms. d.) Features Enables e.) The Center type
questions.answer: c and d

questions.body: As long as Allow Child Record Editing option is enabled for the record type, child records can be editable in parent records. True or False?
questions.answer: True

questions.body: The Global Search can be found on any NetSuite page. True or False?
questions.answer: True

questions.body: Where is the option to change Forecast from Monthly to Quarterly?
questions.answer: Sales Preferences

questions.body: Which two transactions can be refunded without first requiring a Credit Memo. a.) Invoice b.) Unapplied Customer Deposit c.) Applied Customer Deposit d.) Cash Sale
questions.answer: b and d

questions.body: What is the effect of using an inventory worksheet on a LIFO costed item?
questions.answer: LIFO cost will default to the last purchase price

questions.body: A Cash sale can be created when
questions.answer: A walk in customer pays with a credit card and all items are in stock

questions.body: A Sales Order must be created for an order to ship out properly. True or False?
questions.answer: True

questions.body: When is it possible to delete an employee record?
questions.answer: After accidentally creating a duplicate employee record

questions.body: What is the most popular search method to find almost anything?
questions.answer: Using the Global Search

questions.body: Which setting will ensure that an invoice is generated rather than a Cash Sale when a Sales Order is billed?
questions.answer: Check the Invoice checkbox on the Standard Sales Order form

questions.body: Which two pieces of information are visible by default on the My Login Audit portlet on a dashboard?
questions.answer: Previous Login and Login Failure Today

questions.body: Which feature gives warehouse and accounting departments separate processes for working with purchases order?
questions.answer: Advanced Inventory Management

questions.body: Which statement is true about NetSuites ecommerce functionality?
questions.answer: Integration with the accounting module required WSDK codes

questions.body: What is a consequence of a user overriding a Vendor Credit Limit Warning message?
questions.answer: New Purchase Orders cannot be created for the vendor

questions.body: What are two ways a Saved Search can be restricted from users?
questions.answer: Saved Search Role Settings and Audience Search REstrictions

questions.body: What are two options in Accounting Preferences
questions.answer: Require manual input of quantities when fulfilling orders and Bill the customer before shipping the product to them

questions.body: Where can a user navigate to identify NetSuites current system performance within a browser
questions.answer: Navigate to https://status.netsuite.com to display the NS-stat report

questions.body: Which two actions increase a browsers system performance?
questions.answer: Use the smallest level of refresh and Clear the cache settings

questions.body: How can NetSuite be updated to incorporate revised US state tax rates?
questions.answer: Rerun the tax import for the affected state

questions.body: What are two ways to bring up a new sales order?
questions.answer: Locating the sales order quick link and navigating the dashboard tabs

questions.body: How can an accountant see all report by period?
questions.answer: Set report by period to all reports in Accounting Preferences

questions.body: Which three actions can be accomplished with a Mass Update?
questions.answer: Update Order line items, Send Subscriptions messages and Reassign salesperson territories.

questions.body: Which three fields are required on the Standard Lead Form in OneWorld for a company?
questions.answer: Email, Company Name, and Address

questions.body: What are two ways to control and limit NetSuite navigation?
questions.answer: User-assigned role and Global preferences

questions.body: Where does NetSuite provide PDF user guides for specific functional areas?
questions.answer: In SuiteAnswers

questions.body: Which statement is true about using Financial Report Builder?
questions.answer: Users can customize section-level sorting and classification grouping

questions.body: Which two statements are true about NetSuites ecommerce functionality?
questions.answer: Full design option require the use of HTML and Websites using design templates all look the same

questions.body: Which two steps are required to add a user?
questions.answer: Assign defined roles to users and Define user roles

questions.body: Which feature allows the tracking of inventory and pricing of items separately based on items options?
questions.answer: Matrix Items

questions.body: How many major release Cycles does NetSuite have per year?
Where are the definitions of Role Permissions found?
questions.answer: In the Role, on the Permissions tab

questions.body: Which two statements are true about the Delete All data function?
questions.answer: It deletes all transaction data, but leaves one user in place and Only the Administrator role has access to it

questions.body: Which Report Builder option allows users users to assign access to a custom report?
questions.answer: Edit Filters

questions.body: What is the best way to search for a customer in a sales order if you do not know their customer number?
questions.answer: Using the Last Name and Zip Code

questions.body: When can Multi-Location Inventory control be turned off?
questions.answer: After location transfers of inventory to the base warehouse

questions.body: Which tree statements are true about the security authentication of users passwords?
questions.answer: Users can change their password via the Settings portlet, Passwords have strength ratings and cannot be changed until the criterion is met and Password criteria is setup by the system administrator

questions.body: When should the Store Value box on a custom field be unchecked?
questions.answer: When including a hyperlink, to see that link on the form

questions.body: Which two permissions controlling access are supported in NetSuite Roles?
questions.answer: Create but do not Edit and View but do not Edit

questions.body: The Order is billed during the Fulfillment Process. True or False?
questions.answer: False

questions.body: What is the recommended practice for reporting on Accounts Payable by office?
questions.answer: Create a separate Chart of Accounts for each office

questions.body: What are two ways a custom form can be assigned as the roles Preferred Form?
questions.answer: When customizing the role, select the form on the Forms tab and When customizing the form, select the role on the Roles tab

questions.body: A customer receives an email with the tracking information when the order ahs been marked Shipped. True or False?
questions.answer: True

questions.body: Which two statements are true about saved searches and/or custom reports?
questions.answer: Saved searches can provide comparative date ranges and Custom reports provide highlighting

questions.body: What are two ways classifications can be tied to a sales transaction?
questions.answer: Department is only selected at the line level and Location can be assigned the header or at the line level

questions.body: Enable Accounting Features: Enabling this feature creates the system-generated Unbilled Receivables account.
questions.answer: A/R (Accounts Receivable)

questions.body: The three main steps during an order fulfillment are
questions.answer: Picking, Packing, Shipping

questions.body: What are two considerations when establishing elimination subsidiaries in a OneWorld account?
questions.answer: Every child subsidiary must have a matching elimination sub and Only journal entities are permitted

questions.body: Taxes have just been configured for a new tax jurisdiction. After billing a customer in the new jurisdiction, no tax was calculated as expected. What are three possible reasons the tax was not calculated?
questions.answer: Sales Tax lookup is unchecked for the Nexus, Item Schedule Nexus is not defined as taxable or The tax jurisdiction Nexus is missing from the subsidiary

questions.body: How many times can a user attempt to access NetSuite before being locked out?
When creating criteria for a Saved Search, what are two reasons to use expressions?
questions.answer: To perform parenthetical select logic in the selection criteria and To use And/Or logic in selection criteria

questions.body: Which two statements are true about setting up subsidiaries in NetSuite?
questions.answer: It is difficult to change the subsidiary hierarchy after creation and Every OneWorld account must have elimination subsidiaries

questions.body: This is a dynamic data display window. It contains hyperlinks, present metrics, and displays list of info. Select one of the following:
questions.answer: Overview Page

questions.body: Which two Payment Types can only be used to pay Vendors?
questions.answer: Electronic Payments and ACH

questions.body: An assistant has edit access to a managers calendar. Which activities can the assistant perform in the managers calendar?
questions.answer: View, change and decline events
